Seasoned executive with 20+ years of experience across Tech, Beauty, Fashion, and Food sectors, I excel in bridging the gap between corporate and start-up worlds. My adaptability enables me to swiftly learn and integrate diverse perspectives, crafting innovative solutions that challenge the status quo, inspire teams, and accelerate growth.

A dedicated mentor and speaker, I passionately share my expertise in academia and corporate environments, nurturing growth in individuals and teams. My focus lies in entrepreneurship, brand building, and people development.
